title: Track Awesome Game Remakes Updates Daily

items.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on Oct 26, 2024
items.content_text:
### Strategy

*   [OpenE2140 (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/OpenE2140/OpenE2140) - Remake of Earth 2140 based on [the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA)
*   [OpenKrush (‚≠ê107)](https://github.com/IceReaper/OpenKrush) - Remake of KKnD (Krush, Kill 'n' Destroy) and KKnD2 based on [the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA)
*   [OpenSA (‚≠ê106)](https://github.com/Dzierzan/OpenSA) - Remake of Swarm Assault based on [the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA)
*   [Shattered Paradise (‚≠ê73)](https://github.com/ABrandau/Shattered-Paradise-SDK) - Remake of C\&C Tiberian Sun based on [the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA)
*   [Romanov's Vengeance (‚≠ê300)](https://github.com/MustaphaTR/Romanovs-Vengeance) - Remake of C\&C Red Alert 2 based on [the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA)
items.content_html:
Strategy

  • OpenE2140 (‚≠ê43) - Remake of Earth 2140 based on the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)
  • OpenKrush (‚≠ê107) - Remake of KKnD (Krush, Kill 'n' Destroy) and KKnD2 based on the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)
  • OpenSA (‚≠ê106) - Remake of Swarm Assault based on the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)
  • Shattered Paradise (‚≠ê73) - Remake of C&C Tiberian Sun based on the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)
  • Romanov's Vengeance (‚≠ê300) - Remake of C&C Red Alert 2 based on the OpenRA engine (‚≠ê16k)

items.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on May 17, 2024
items.content_text:
### Arcade

*   [C-Dogs SDL (‚≠ê960)](https://github.com/cxong/cdogs-sdl) - Classic overhead run-and-gun game. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [Open Kick-Off (‚≠ê46)](https://github.com/ssenegas/kickoff) - Rewriting attempt of the cult football game Kick Off 2. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [OpenTyrian (‚≠ê489)](https://github.com/opentyrian/opentyrian) - An open-source port of Tyrian from Turbo Pascal to C. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [Taisei (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/taisei-project/taisei) - Fan-made, open-source clone of the Touhou series. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [The Great Escape in C (‚≠ê119)](https://github.com/dpt/The-Great-Escape-in-C) - Classic ZX Spectrum game The Great Escape in portable C. :flower\_playing\_cards:

### FPS

*   [Chocolate Doom (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/chocolate-doom/chocolate-doom) - Source port that is minimalist, historically accurate and includes ports of Heretic and Hexen, and Strife. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [ClassiCube (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/ClassiCube/ClassiCube) - Minecraft Classic compatible client written in C from scratch. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [Doom Legacy](https://sourceforge.net/projects/doomlegacy/) - One of the most popular DOOM source ports, which enhances it with things like TCP/IP networking, OpenGL renderer etc. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [DoomRetro (‚≠ê718)](https://github.com/bradharding/doomretro) - Classic, refined DOOM source port for Windows PC. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [Doomsday Engine (‚≠ê281)](https://github.com/skyjake/Doomsday-Engine) - Source port of id Software's DOOM I/II and Raven Software's Heretic and Hexen. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [FreeCS](https://sourceforge.net/projects/freecs-1-5/) - Free-software re-implementation of Counter-Strike 1.5 running on the FTEQW engine. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [Freedoom (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/freedoom/freedoom) - Free software FPS based on the classic DOOM engine. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [GZDoom (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/coelckers/gzdoom) - Modder-friendly OpenGL and Vulkan source port based on the DOOM engine. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [Odamex (‚≠ê233)](https://github.com/odamex/odamex) - Online multiplayer DOOM port with a strong focus on the original gameplay while providing a breadth of enhancements. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [The Eternity Engine (‚≠ê249)](https://github.com/team-eternity/eternity) - Advanced DOOM source port. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [Zandronum](https://zandronum.com/) - Multiplayer oriented port, based off Skulltag, for Doom and Doom II. Also runs Heretic, Hexen and Strife. :flower\_playing\_cards:

### Online

*   [2006rebotted (‚≠ê29)](https://github.com/dginovker/2006rebotted) - A 2006 RuneScape 2 Emulation Server. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [2004scape](https://2004scape.org) - A free & open-source remake of 2004 era RuneScape 2. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [2009scape](https://2009scape.org) - A free & open-source remake of 2009 era RuneScape 2. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [FreeSO (‚≠ê889)](https://github.com/riperiperi/FreeSO) - Reimplementation of The Sims Online, targetted mainly at mobile devices. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [MineClone2](https://git.minetest.land/MineClone2/MineClone2) - Stable, moddable & free/libre clone of Minecraft based on the Minetest engine. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [OpenRSC](https://gitlab.com/open-runescape-classic/core) - Open source accurate RuneScape Classic (2001-2003) game server in Java, based on recorded data and videos. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [RSC-C (‚≠ê98)](https://github.com/2003scape/rsc-c) - Rewrite of the RuneScape Classic (2001-2003) game client in portable C. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [RuneLite (‚≠ê5k)](https://github.com/runelite/runelite) - Open source Old School RuneScape (OSRS) client. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [Ryzom Core (‚≠ê382)](https://github.com/ryzom/ryzomcore) - Ryzom Core contains the whole code (client, server, tools) used to make the commercial MMORPG Ryzom. :flower\_playing\_cards:

### Platformer

*   [Commander Genius](https://gitlab.com/Dringgstein/Commander-Genius) - Modern Interpreter for the Commander Keen Games. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [The Secret Chronicles of Dr. M (‚≠ê214)](https://github.com/secretchronicles/TSC) - Adaptation of Secret Mario Chronicles. :flower\_playing\_cards:

### Racing

*   [wipEout Rewrite (‚≠ê2.8k)](https://github.com/phoboslab/wipeout-rewrite) - This is a re-implementation of the 1995 PSX game wipEout. :flower\_playing\_cards:

### Strategy

*   [Ancient Beast (‚≠ê1.8k)](https://github.com/FreezingMoon/AncientBeast) - Spiritual successor to Heroes of Might and Magic III focusing on combat; matched based eSport.
*   [OpenHV (‚≠ê938)](https://github.com/OpenHV/OpenHV) - Open-source implementation of Hard Vacuum. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [Open Panzer (‚≠ê168)](https://github.com/nicupavel/openpanzer) - HTML5 Panzer General 2. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [OpenTTD (‚≠ê7k)](https://github.com/OpenTTD/OpenTTD) - OpenTTD is a transport simulation game based upon the popular game Transport Tycoon Deluxe, written by Chris Sawyer. :flower\_playing\_cards:
*   [Warzone 2100 (‚≠ê3.4k)](https://github.com/Warzone2100/warzone2100) - Free and open-source real time strategy game. :flower\_playing\_cards:

  • The Secret Chronicles of Dr. M (‚≠ê214) - Adaptation of Secret Mario Chronicles. üé¥

items.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on Mar 12, 2020
items.content_text:
### Action

*   [Carnage3D (‚≠ê499)](https://github.com/codenamecpp/carnage3d) - Reimplementation of Grand Theft Auto.
*   [donut (‚≠ê443)](https://github.com/plowteam/donut) - Reimplementation of The Simpsons: Hit & Run in modern C++ and modern OpenGL.
*   [OpenJK (‚≠ê2.1k)](https://github.com/JACoders/OpenJK) - Community effort to maintain and improve Jedi Academy and Jedi Outcast by Raven Software.
*   [OpenLara (‚≠ê4.9k)](https://github.com/XProger/OpenLara) - Classic Tomb Raider open-source engine.
*   [OpenTomb (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/opentomb/OpenTomb) - Original Tomb Raider 1-5 experience with contemporary updates, features and additions.
*   [remc2 (‚≠ê122)](https://github.com/turican0/remc2) - Reverse engineering of Magic Carpet 2 from Assembler.
*   [San Andreas Unity (‚≠ê2.4k)](https://github.com/GTA-ASM/SanAndreasUnity) - Reimplementation of GTA: San Andreas game engine in Unity.
*   [TOMB5 (‚≠ê499)](https://github.com/TOMB5/TOMB5) - Tomb Raider: Chronicles disassembly translated to C source code.

### Adventure

*   [ScummVM (‚≠ê2.5k)](https://github.com/scummvm/scummvm) - Allows you to run certain classic graphical point-and-click adventure games such Maniac Mansion and Monkey Island.

### Arcade

*   [Zelda Classic (‚≠ê9)](https://github.com/ArmageddonGames/ZeldaClassic) - A game and editing tool that lets you create custom Legend of Zelda quests.

### FPS

*   [Allegiance (‚≠ê87)](https://github.com/FreeAllegiance/Allegiance) - Allegiance is RTS and FPS Space Combat game.
*   [ECWolf](https://bitbucket.org/ecwolf/ecwolf/src/master/) - Port of Wolfenstein 3D based on Wolf4SDL.
*   [Hexen II: Hammer of Thyrion](https://sourceforge.net/p/uhexen2/code/HEAD/tree/) - Cross-platform port of the Hexen II game.
*   [NBlood (‚≠ê671)](https://github.com/nukeykt/NBlood) - Port of the classic FPS Blood.
*   [OpenSpades (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/yvt/openspades) - Compatible client of Ace of Spades, a voxel FPS.
*   [RBDOOM-3-BFG (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/RobertBeckebans/RBDOOM-3-BFG) - Doom 3 BFG Edition with soft shadows, cleaned up source, Linux and 64 bit Support.
*   [RedneckGDX](https://gitlab.com/m210/RedneckGDX) - Port of Redneck Rampage.
*   [Tyrquake (‚≠ê45)](https://github.com/libretro/tyrquake) - Libretro port of Tyrquake.

### Online

*   [Meridian 59 (‚≠ê458)](https://github.com/Meridian59/Meridian59) - The first 3D MMORPG, released in 1996 and open sourced in 2012. The original codebase for Meridian 59.
*   [Opengate](https://sourceforge.net/projects/opengate/) - Remake of Jumpgate.

### RPG

*   [DGEngine (‚≠ê263)](https://github.com/dgengin/DGEngine) - Implementation of the Diablo game engine.
*   [Freeablo (‚≠ê2.2k)](https://github.com/wheybags/freeablo) - Open-source implementation of the Diablo engine.
*   [GemRB (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/gemrb/gemrb) - Portable open-source reimplementation of the Infinity Engine (used by Baldur's Gate, Icewind Dale and more).
*   [OpenGothic (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/Try/OpenGothic) - Reimplementation of Gothic 2: Night of the Raven.
*   [OpenTESArena (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/afritz1/OpenTESArena) - Modern engine reimplementation of The Elder Scrolls: Arena by Bethesda Softworks.
*   [sfall (‚≠ê377)](https://github.com/phobos2077/sfall) - A set of engine modifications for the classic game Fallout 2.
*   [UAlbion (‚≠ê144)](https://github.com/csinkers/ualbion) - Remake of 1995 Albion.
*   [WitchavenGDX](https://gitlab.com/m210/WitchavenGDX) - Witchaven Java port.
*   [xoreos (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/xoreos/xoreos) - Implementation of BioWare's Aurora engine and its derivatives (used by Neverwinter Nights, The Witcher and more).
*   [zorkClone (‚≠ê17)](https://github.com/vatbub/zorkClone) - Reimplementation of the original Zork game developed by Infocom.

### Platformer

*   [Alive Reversing (‚≠ê381)](https://github.com/AliveTeam/alive_reversing) - Reimplementation of Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus.
*   [Jazz¬≤ Resurrection (‚≠ê522)](https://github.com/deathkiller/jazz2) - Reimplementation of Jazz Jackrabbit 2.
*   [Lionheart Remake (‚≠ê80)](https://github.com/b3dgs/lionheart-remake) - Java remake of Lionheart Amiga game.
*   [Prince-Monogame (‚≠ê46)](https://github.com/salvadorc17/Prince-Monogame) - Monogame implementation of Prince of Persia 2.

### Racing

*   [Vangers (‚≠ê702)](https://github.com/KranX/Vangers) - Racing/RPG hybrid made open-source by its creators, written in C++.

### Simulator

*   [DXX-Rebirth (‚≠ê536)](https://github.com/dxx-rebirth/dxx-rebirth) - Source port of the Descent and Descent 2 Engines for Windows, macOS, Linux.
*   [Librelancer (‚≠ê536)](https://github.com/Librelancer/Librelancer) - Reimplementation of the 2003 space game Freelancer.

### Strategy

*   [CorsixTH (‚≠ê4.2k)](https://github.com/CorsixTH/CorsixTH) - Clone of Theme Hospital with support for modern operating systems, high resolutions and much more.
*   [Cortex Command Community Project Source (‚≠ê204)](https://github.com/cortex-command-community/Cortex-Command-Community-Project-Source) - Community-driven effort to continue the development of Cortex Command.
*   [Jagged Alliance Stracciatella (‚≠ê480)](https://github.com/ja2-stracciatella/ja2-stracciatella) - Makes Jagged Alliance 2 available on a wide range of platforms.
*   [KaM Remake (‚≠ê368)](https://github.com/Kromster80/kam_remake) - RTS game remake of Knights and Merchants written in Delphi from scratch.
*   [OpenApocalypse (‚≠ê539)](https://github.com/OpenApoc/OpenApoc) - Rebuild of the X-COM: Apocalypse engine.
*   [openblack (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/openblack/openblack) - Reimplementation of Black & White.
*   [OpenDUNE (‚≠ê1.6k)](https://github.com/OpenDUNE/OpenDUNE) - Recreation of the popular game Dune II.
*   [Open Fodder (‚≠ê483)](https://github.com/OpenFodder/openfodder) - Open-source implementation of Cannon Fodder.
*   [OpenRA (‚≠ê16k)](https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA) - Implementation of the Red Alert engine using .NET/mono and OpenGL. Runs on Windows, Linux and macOS.
*   [OpenRCT2 (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/OpenRCT2/OpenRCT2) - Recreation of RollerCoaster Tycoon 2.
*   [OpenSAGE (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/OpenSAGE/OpenSAGE) - C# reimplementation of SAGE, the game engine used by a bunch of EA Pacific games, including Command & Conquer: Generals and Battle for Middle Earth.
*   [OpenSC2K (‚≠ê5k)](https://github.com/nicholas-ochoa/OpenSC2K) - Remake of SimCity 2000 by Maxis.
*   [OpenXcom (‚≠ê2k)](https://github.com/SupSuper/OpenXcom) - Clone of UFO: Enemy Unknown and X-COM: Terror From the Deep.
*   [OutpostHD (‚≠ê120)](https://github.com/OutpostUniverse/OPHD) - Remake of Sierra On-Line's Outpost.
*   [Race into Space (‚≠ê190)](https://github.com/raceintospace/raceintospace) - Version of Interplay's Buzz Aldrin's Race into Space.
*   [Return To The Roots (‚≠ê515)](https://github.com/Return-To-The-Roots/s25client) - Settlers II remake written in C++.
items.content_html:
Action

  • Carnage3D (‚≠ê499) - Reimplementation of Grand Theft Auto.
  • donut (‚≠ê443) - Reimplementation of The Simpsons: Hit & Run in modern C++ and modern OpenGL.
  • OpenJK (‚≠ê2.1k) - Community effort to maintain and improve Jedi Academy and Jedi Outcast by Raven Software.
  • OpenLara (‚≠ê4.9k) - Classic Tomb Raider open-source engine.
  • OpenTomb (‚≠ê1.4k) - Original Tomb Raider 1-5 experience with contemporary updates, features and additions.
  • remc2 (‚≠ê122) - Reverse engineering of Magic Carpet 2 from Assembler.
  • San Andreas Unity (‚≠ê2.4k) - Reimplementation of GTA: San Andreas game engine in Unity.
  • TOMB5 (‚≠ê499) - Tomb Raider: Chronicles disassembly translated to C source code.

Adventure

  • ScummVM (‚≠ê2.5k) - Allows you to run certain classic graphical point-and-click adventure games such Maniac Mansion and Monkey Island.

Arcade

  • Zelda Classic (‚≠ê9) - A game and editing tool that lets you create custom Legend of Zelda quests.

FPS

  • Allegiance (‚≠ê87) - Allegiance is RTS and FPS Space Combat game.
  • ECWolf - Port of Wolfenstein 3D based on Wolf4SDL.
  • Hexen II: Hammer of Thyrion - Cross-platform port of the Hexen II game.
  • NBlood (‚≠ê671) - Port of the classic FPS Blood.
  • OpenSpades (‚≠ê1.2k) - Compatible client of Ace of Spades, a voxel FPS.
  • RBDOOM-3-BFG (‚≠ê1.6k) - Doom 3 BFG Edition with soft shadows, cleaned up source, Linux and 64 bit Support.
  • RedneckGDX - Port of Redneck Rampage.
  • Tyrquake (‚≠ê45) - Libretro port of Tyrquake.

Online

  • Meridian 59 (‚≠ê458) - The first 3D MMORPG, released in 1996 and open sourced in 2012. The original codebase for Meridian 59.
  • Opengate - Remake of Jumpgate.

RPG

  • DGEngine (‚≠ê263) - Implementation of the Diablo game engine.
  • Freeablo (‚≠ê2.2k) - Open-source implementation of the Diablo engine.
  • GemRB (‚≠ê1.1k) - Portable open-source reimplementation of the Infinity Engine (used by Baldur's Gate, Icewind Dale and more).
  • OpenGothic (‚≠ê1.3k) - Reimplementation of Gothic 2: Night of the Raven.
  • OpenTESArena (‚≠ê1.2k) - Modern engine reimplementation of The Elder Scrolls: Arena by Bethesda Softworks.
  • sfall (‚≠ê377) - A set of engine modifications for the classic game Fallout 2.
  • UAlbion (‚≠ê144) - Remake of 1995 Albion.
  • WitchavenGDX - Witchaven Java port.
  • xoreos (‚≠ê1.1k) - Implementation of BioWare's Aurora engine and its derivatives (used by Neverwinter Nights, The Witcher and more).
  • zorkClone (‚≠ê17) - Reimplementation of the original Zork game developed by Infocom.

Platformer

  • Alive Reversing (‚≠ê381) - Reimplementation of Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus.
  • Jazz¬≤ Resurrection (‚≠ê522) - Reimplementation of Jazz Jackrabbit 2.
  • Lionheart Remake (‚≠ê80) - Java remake of Lionheart Amiga game.
  • Prince-Monogame (‚≠ê46) - Monogame implementation of Prince of Persia 2.

Racing

  • Vangers (‚≠ê702) - Racing/RPG hybrid made open-source by its creators, written in C++.

Simulator

  • DXX-Rebirth (‚≠ê536) - Source port of the Descent and Descent 2 Engines for Windows, macOS, Linux.
  • Librelancer (‚≠ê536) - Reimplementation of the 2003 space game Freelancer.

Strategy

  • CorsixTH (‚≠ê4.2k) - Clone of Theme Hospital with support for modern operating systems, high resolutions and much more.
  • Cortex Command Community Project Source (‚≠ê204) - Community-driven effort to continue the development of Cortex Command.
  • Jagged Alliance Stracciatella (‚≠ê480) - Makes Jagged Alliance 2 available on a wide range of platforms.
  • KaM Remake (‚≠ê368) - RTS game remake of Knights and Merchants written in Delphi from scratch.
  • OpenApocalypse (‚≠ê539) - Rebuild of the X-COM: Apocalypse engine.
  • openblack (‚≠ê1.4k) - Reimplementation of Black & White.
  • OpenDUNE (‚≠ê1.6k) - Recreation of the popular game Dune II.
  • Open Fodder (‚≠ê483) - Open-source implementation of Cannon Fodder.
  • OpenRA (‚≠ê16k) - Implementation of the Red Alert engine using .NET/mono and OpenGL. Runs on Windows, Linux and macOS.
  • OpenRCT2 (‚≠ê14k) - Recreation of RollerCoaster Tycoon 2.
  • OpenSAGE (‚≠ê1.5k) - C# reimplementation of SAGE, the game engine used by a bunch of EA Pacific games, including Command & Conquer: Generals and Battle for Middle Earth.
  • OpenSC2K (‚≠ê5k) - Remake of SimCity 2000 by Maxis.
  • OpenXcom (‚≠ê2k) - Clone of UFO: Enemy Unknown and X-COM: Terror From the Deep.
  • OutpostHD (‚≠ê120) - Remake of Sierra On-Line's Outpost.
  • Race into Space (‚≠ê190) - Version of Interplay's Buzz Aldrin's Race into Space.
  • Return To The Roots (‚≠ê515) - Settlers II remake written in C++.

items.title: Awesome Game Remakes Updates on Mar 10, 2020
items.content_text:
### Action

*   [OpenMB (‚≠ê128)](https://github.com/cookgreen/OpenMB) - Role-playing game engine for Taleworlds' Mount\&Blade Series.

### Arcade

*   [Barbarian](http://barbarian.1987.free.fr/indexEN.htm) - Open-source clone of Barbarian: The Ultimate Warrior.
*   [Mr.Boom (‚≠ê207)](https://github.com/Javanaise/mrboom-libretro) - 8 player Bomberman clone for RetroArch/Libretro.
*   [OpenClonk (‚≠ê362)](https://github.com/openclonk/openclonk) - Multiplayer action game where you control small and nimble humanoids.

### FPS

*   [CatacombGL (‚≠ê165)](https://github.com/ArnoAnsems/CatacombGL) - Windows source port of Catacomb 3D and the Catacomb Adventure series.
*   [DukeGDX](https://gitlab.com/m210/DukeGDX) - Duke Nukem 3D port.
*   [ezQuake (‚≠ê286)](https://github.com/ezQuake/ezquake-source) - Combining the features of all modern QuakeWorld clients, ezQuake makes QuakeWorld easier to start and play.
*   [ioquake3 (‚≠ê2.6k)](https://github.com/ioquake/ioq3) - The free software FPS engine that can be used to play Quake 3, or make your own game.
*   [QuakeSpasm](https://sourceforge.net/projects/quakespasm/) - A modern, cross-platform Quake game engine.
*   [Yamagi Quake II (‚≠ê913)](https://github.com/yquake2/yquake2) - Enhanced client for id Software's Quake II with focus on offline and coop gameplay.

### RPG

*   [Arx Libertatis (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/arx/ArxLibertatis) - Cross-platform port of Arx Fatalis, a first-person role-playing game.
*   [Barony (‚≠ê590)](https://github.com/TurningWheel/Barony) - Open source release of Barony.
*   [BtBuilder (‚≠ê44)](https://github.com/dulsi/btbuilder) - An open source implementation of the Bard's Tale Construction Set.
*   [Daggerfall Unity (‚≠ê3.1k)](https://github.com/Interkarma/daggerfall-unity) - Recreation of Daggerfall in the Unity engine.
*   [Devilution (‚≠ê8.9k)](https://github.com/diasurgical/devilution) - Reconstructed form of Diablo's original source code.
*   [DevilutionX (‚≠ê8.8k)](https://github.com/diasurgical/devilutionX) - Diablo build for modern operating systems.
*   [Exult (‚≠ê589)](https://github.com/exult/exult) - Project to recreate Ultima 7 for modern operating systems.
*   [Falltergeist (‚≠ê883)](https://github.com/falltergeist/falltergeist) - Crossplatform Fallout 2 game engine writen in C++ and SDL.
*   [FreeFT (‚≠ê172)](https://github.com/nadult/FreeFT) - Real-time, isometric action game engine inspired by Fallout Tactics.
*   [OpenMW (‚≠ê5.8k)](https://github.com/OpenMW/openmw) - Reimplementation of the Morrowind game engine.
*   [OpenVIII (‚≠ê667)](https://github.com/MaKiPL/OpenVIII) - Final Fantasy VIII engine implementation in C#.
*   [REGoth (‚≠ê474)](https://github.com/REGoth-project/REGoth-bs) - An open source reimplementation of zEngine the engine behind Gothic and Gothic II.
*   [Riiablo (‚≠ê1k)](https://github.com/collinsmith/riiablo) - Diablo II remade using Java and LibGDX.
*   [Shockolate (‚≠ê838)](https://github.com/Interrupt/systemshock) - Same great System Shock, new great taste.

### Platformer

*   [NXEngine-evo (‚≠ê515)](https://github.com/nxengine/nxengine-evo) - Rewrite of the masterpiece jump-and-run platformer Doukutsu Monogatari (also known as Cave Story).
*   [SDLPoP (‚≠ê1.2k)](https://github.com/NagyD/SDLPoP) - Port of Prince of Persia, based on the disassembly of the DOS version.
*   [VVVVV (‚≠ê7.8k)](https://github.com/TerryCavanagh/vvvvvv) - The source code to VVVVVV.

### Racing

*   [DreeRally (‚≠ê93)](https://github.com/enriquesomolinos/DreeRally) - Death Rally engine reimplementation.
*   [OpenNFS (‚≠ê679)](https://github.com/OpenNFS/OpenNFS) - Attempt to recreate the classic Need for Speed Games (1-6).

### Simulator

*   [FS2Open (‚≠ê429)](https://github.com/scp-fs2open/fs2open.github.com) - FreeSpace2 Source Code Project.

### Strategy

*   [Antares (‚≠ê104)](https://github.com/arescentral/antares) - Remake of Ares, a tactical space combat game.
*   [CivOne (‚≠ê257)](https://github.com/SWY1985/CivOne) - Implementation of Sid Meier's Civilization.
*   [FreeCol](https://sourceforge.net/projects/freecol/) - Turn-based strategy game based on the old game Colonization.
*   [Julius (‚≠ê3k)](https://github.com/bvschaik/julius) - Reimplementation of Caesar III.
*   [KeeperRL (‚≠ê915)](https://github.com/miki151/keeperrl) - Roguelike dungeon builder inspired by Dwarf Fortress.
*   [openage (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/SFTtech/openage) - Clone of the Age of Empires II engine.
*   [OpenLoco (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/OpenLoco/OpenLoco) - Reimplementation of Chris Sawyer's Locomotion.
*   [Sourcehold (‚≠ê267)](https://github.com/sourcehold/Sourcehold) - Implementation of Stronghold by Firefly Studios.
*   [VCMI (‚≠ê5k)](https://github.com/vcmi/vcmi) - Engine for Heroes of Might and Magic III.
*   [Wargus (‚≠ê387)](https://github.com/Wargus/wargus) -  Warcraft 2 Mod that allows you to play Warcraft 2 with the Stratagus engine.
*   [Zed Online](https://sourceforge.net/projects/zedonline/) - Remake of the 1996 classic game Z.
items.content_html:
Action

  • OpenMB (‚≠ê128) - Role-playing game engine for Taleworlds' Mount&Blade Series.

Arcade

  • Barbarian - Open-source clone of Barbarian: The Ultimate Warrior.
  • Mr.Boom (‚≠ê207) - 8 player Bomberman clone for RetroArch/Libretro.
  • OpenClonk (‚≠ê362) - Multiplayer action game where you control small and nimble humanoids.

FPS

  • CatacombGL (‚≠ê165) - Windows source port of Catacomb 3D and the Catacomb Adventure series.
  • DukeGDX - Duke Nukem 3D port.
  • ezQuake (‚≠ê286) - Combining the features of all modern QuakeWorld clients, ezQuake makes QuakeWorld easier to start and play.
  • ioquake3 (‚≠ê2.6k) - The free software FPS engine that can be used to play Quake 3, or make your own game.
  • QuakeSpasm - A modern, cross-platform Quake game engine.
  • Yamagi Quake II (‚≠ê913) - Enhanced client for id Software's Quake II with focus on offline and coop gameplay.

RPG

  • Arx Libertatis (‚≠ê1k) - Cross-platform port of Arx Fatalis, a first-person role-playing game.
  • Barony (‚≠ê590) - Open source release of Barony.
  • BtBuilder (‚≠ê44) - An open source implementation of the Bard's Tale Construction Set.

  • REGoth (‚≠ê474) - An open source reimplementation of zEngine the engine behind Gothic and Gothic II.

Strategy

  • Antares (‚≠ê104) - Remake of Ares, a tactical space combat game.
  • CivOne (‚≠ê257) - Implementation of Sid Meier's Civilization.
  • FreeCol - Turn-based strategy game based on the old game Colonization.
  • Julius (‚≠ê3k) - Reimplementation of Caesar III.
  • KeeperRL (‚≠ê915) - Roguelike dungeon builder inspired by Dwarf Fortress.
  • openage (‚≠ê14k) - Clone of the Age of Empires II engine.
  • OpenLoco (‚≠ê1.5k) - Reimplementation of Chris Sawyer's Locomotion.
  • Sourcehold (‚≠ê267) - Implementation of Stronghold by Firefly Studios.
  • VCMI (‚≠ê5k) - Engine for Heroes of Might and Magic III.
  • Wargus (‚≠ê387) - Warcraft 2 Mod that allows you to play Warcraft 2 with the Stratagus engine.
  • Zed Online - Remake of the 1996 classic game Z.
